ghostPost.title: Neural Network Intelligence (NNI)
ghostPost.excerpt: On the cutting edge of AI projects, NNI is an open-source AutoML development. Allowing access to all major AI frameworks, NNI is a unique offering for Data Science teams adding an AI practice.

tags.description: Experience deploying cloud first application architecture and workforce platforms across Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, and others cloud platforms. Interest in AI/ML ethically on the edge, energy efficient compute, and empowering change and access through technology.
tags.meta_description: Talking about deploying content to the cloud! Clean compute, private ML models, and more.

ghostPost.plaintext:
Tools for AutoML and Beyond
 * Rich and comprehensive toolkit
    * all major frameworks
    * 28 popular AutoML algorithms
   
   
 * Expanding functionalities and coverage
   

Demo of NNI Fundamentals
This is a mature project with wonderful tooling, desirable features like an
established container approach, GUI, verbose CLI, and support for any major
framework you desire.
ghostPost.html:
Tools for AutoML and Beyond

  • Rich and comprehensive toolkit

    • all major frameworks
    • 28 popular AutoML algorithms

  • Expanding functionalities and coverage

Demo of NNI Fundamentals

This is a mature project with wonderful tooling, desirable features like an established container approach, GUI, verbose CLI, and support for any major framework you desire.
